channel.title: ConsumerCast UK
channel.description: The ConsumerCast podcast brings you up to date with some of the top current consumer deals and offers available in the UK
channel.itunes:subtitle: UK Consumer Deals and News
channel.itunes:summary: The ConsumerCast podcast brings you to date with some of the top current consumer deals and offers available in the UK
channel.itunes:author: Carl and Pete

item.title: FrequencyCast Product Review - Lavazza Coffee Machine
item.description: A hands-on mini-review of the Amodo Mio Lavazza Coffee Maker. More details of this coffee machine at http://www.consumerdeals.co.uk/lavazzaamodomio.html
item.itunes:subtitle: FrequencyCast Product Review - Lavazza Coffee Machine
item.itunes:summary: A hands-on mini-review of the Amodo Mio Lavazza Coffee Maker. More details of this coffee machine at http://www.consumerdeals.co.uk/lavazzaamodomio.html
item.itunes:author: ConsumerCast

item.title: FrequencyCast UK Teaser
item.description: We know that all is quiet on this feed. The team behind the ConsumerDeals podcast also produce a show called FrequencyCast. Here is a short 90 second teaser of FrequencyCast, Please take a listen. you will find the shows of interest and want to sign up.
item.itunes:subtitle: FrequencyCast UK Teaser
item.itunes:summary: We know that that all is quiet on this feed. The team behind the ConsumerDeals podcast also produce a show called FrequencyCast. Here is a short 90 second teaser of FrequencyCast, Please take a listen. We hope you will find the shows of interest and want to sign up.
item.itunes:author: FrequencyCast.co.uk

item.title: ConsumerCast UK Show 04
item.description: Current as of 12 October 2008, show includes: half-price Sky HD, money off at Dixons and Coment, 5000 Nectar Points, free Skypephone and free SIM cards. Details at http://www.consumerdeals.co.uk/offers.html
item.itunes:subtitle: ConsumerCast UK Show 04
item.itunes:summary: Current as of 12 October 2008, show includes: half-price Sky HD, money off at Dixons and Coment, 5000 Nectar Points, free Skypephone and free SIM cards. Details at http://www.consumerdeals.co.uk/offers.html
item.itunes:author: ConsumerCast

item.title: ConsumerCast UK Show 03
item.description: ConsumerCast 03 takes a look at the latest in the UK Broadband wars, ways to claim back unfair bank charges, girlie phone bargains, low-price mobile Internet, free SIM cards and Nectar points, and some money-off vouchers.
item.itunes:subtitle: ConsumerCast UK Show 03
item.itunes:summary: ConsumerCast 03 takes a look at the latest in the UK Broadband wars, ways to claim back unfair bank charges, girlie phone bargains, low-price mobile Internet, free SIM cards and Nectar points, and some money-off vouchers.
item.itunes:author: ConsumerCast

item.title: ConsumerCast UK Show 02
item.description: UK broadband deals hotting up, price increases from British Gas, a new reward card from MBNA, details of a free iPod offer, and some money-off vouchers.
item.itunes:subtitle: ConsumerCast UK Show 02
item.itunes:summary: UK broadband deals hotting up, price increases from British Gas, a new reward card from MBNA, details of a free iPod offer, and some money-off vouchers.
item.itunes:author: ConsumerCast

item.title: ConsumerCast UK Show 01
item.description: The first ConsumerCast features news on deals for UK consumers, such as free broadband for life, the latest from Orange, o2 and Vodafone, Sky's latest offer, more on Freeview, £50 from a bank, an underwear sale and money off electricals.
item.itunes:subtitle: ConsumerCast UK Show 01
item.itunes:summary: The first ConsumerCast features news on deals for UK consumers, such as free broadband for life, the latest from Orange, o2 and Vodafone, Sky's latest offer, more on Freeview, £50 from a bank, an underwear sale and money off electricals.
